Name: Lux
Text: Here we are, you remember this little fella earlier? They are called the Lotus of Aspiration

Name: Lux
Text: They are the gateways to the numerous levels of Daylee

Name: Lux
Text: You see those pillars? They were created by the ancients of Daylee

Name: Lux
Text: The runes inscribed on them were said to encourage passing travelers but no one understands them anymore. I wonder what language it is?

Name: Lux
Text: Oh I almost forogt, keybindings can be changed via the menu. (ESC) to bring it up

Name: Lux
Text: That's enough from me, the levels ahead are quite tough and challenging, Good luck!
